WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for letting us know - we saw the traffic on Twitter, and the github docs for JAMA (which were out of date anyway) were removed from the develop branch of the repository
WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
 
I inform you about a possible bug/issue refered to PHPExcel that has been detected in SaltOS (a software that uses PHPExcel):
- http://secunia.com/advisories/50312/
 
My solution consists to remove the docs, examples and tests directories of the PHPExcel/Shared/JAMA directory.
 
Josep Sanz, saltos.net

Comments.Message: You're way behind.... this has already been resolved on github
